trans-unit.source: Create and Deploy the BizTalk Services Project
trans-unit.target: Create and Deploy the BizTalk Services Project

trans-unit.source: Create, deploy, and test the enterprise application integration (EAI) scenario for the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Create, deploy, and test the enterprise application integration (EAI) scenario for the tutorial.

trans-unit.source: In the EAI scenario, Contoso sends XML messages to a <token>af_integration</token> <token>bridge</token> deployed on <token>azure_2</token>.
trans-unit.target: In the EAI scenario, Contoso sends XML messages to a <token>af_integration</token> <token>bridge</token> deployed on <token>azure_2</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>bridge</token> validates the message against the expected schema, transforms the message to the schema for the insert operation on the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> SQL Server table, and then inserts data into the SQL Server table.
trans-unit.target: The <token>bridge</token> validates the message against the expected schema, transforms the message to the schema for the insert operation on the <embeddedLabel>SalesOrder</embeddedLabel> SQL Server table, and then inserts data into the SQL Server table.

trans-unit.source: This section lists the steps to create the project, add the artifacts, deploy the project, and test the items you configured.
trans-unit.target: This section lists the steps to create the project, add the artifacts, deploy the project, and test the items you configured.
